name: tradingview-syariah-indicator
description: Display small shariah indicator to stock list in tradingview(MY)

scripts.ff:prod: npm run pre:build && web-ext run --source-dir 'dist' --target chromium --start-url https://tradingview.com/symbols/MYX-k1/
scripts.c:prod: npm run pre:build && web-ext run --source-dir 'dist' --target chromium --start-url https://tradingview.com/symbols/MYX-k1/

author: Azriz Haziq <azrizhaziq@gmail.com> (https://azrizhaziq.github.io/portfolio)
